metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for teenage male character

scenes.title: Alarm Blaring
scenes.description: A 16-year-old white teenage boy lies in a twin bed under a navy blue comforter, face buried in pillow. The room is dark except for the glowing smartphone on the nightstand, alarm blaring. The walls are covered with posters: sports teams (Ohio State Buckeyes), video game characters, a band poster. A desk with a laptop, textbooks, and scattered papers is against one wall. Clothes are on the floor. A basketball sits in the corner near a closet door.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, teenage boy's dark bedroom, 16-year-old white boy with sandy blonde hair sleeping in twin bed, navy blue comforter, face in pillow, glowing smartphone alarm on nightstand, walls covered with sports and video game posters, messy desk with laptop and textbooks, clothes on floor, basketball in corner, dark room lit only by phone glow
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, bright room, clean organized room, adult, child

scenes.title: Sitting Up Reluctantly
scenes.description: Tyler sits up in bed, sandy blonde hair messy and sticking up, eyes barely open. He wears a gray t-shirt, looking exhausted. One hand rubs his face. The navy comforter is bunched around his waist. His phone is in his other hand, checking notifications blearily. The desk with laptop and homework is visible.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with messy sandy blonde hair sitting up in twin bed, exhausted expression, eyes barely open, wearing gray t-shirt, rubbing face with one hand, checking phone in other hand, navy blue comforter bunched around waist, desk with laptop visible, dim morning light, waking up reluctantly
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, alert expression, neat hair, adult, child, dark hair

scenes.title: Standing and Stretching
scenes.description: Tyler stands in the middle of his bedroom stretching, arms overhead, yawning. He wears a gray t-shirt and athletic shorts. The room shows teenage clutter: desk with open laptop and textbooks, gaming headset hanging on chair, laundry basket overflowing, basketball in corner, backpack on floor. Morning light starts filtering through the blinds.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde messy hair standing in bedroom stretching, arms overhead, yawning, wearing gray t-shirt and athletic shorts, messy teen room with desk and laptop, gaming headset on chair, overflowing laundry basket, basketball in corner, backpack on floor, morning light through blinds, full room view
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, clean organized room, adult, child, dark hair

scenes.title: Checking Closet
scenes.description: Tyler stands at his open closet door, deciding what to wear. The closet shows typical teen clothes: hoodies on hangers (some branded with logos), t-shirts, jeans, one dress shirt for special occasions. Sneakers scattered on the closet floor: Nikes, Vans, old running shoes. A skateboard leans against the inside wall.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde messy hair standing at open closet, deciding what to wear, hoodies on hangers, t-shirts and jeans visible, various sneakers on closet floor (Nike, Vans), skateboard leaning inside, morning light, teen bedroom, selecting clothes
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, neat organized closet, adult clothes, child, dark hair

scenes.title: Packing Backpack
scenes.description: Tyler at his desk, shoving notebooks and textbooks into his backpack. The backpack is a black Jansport, well-worn. On the desk: open laptop showing last night's homework, scattered papers, pencils, a calculator. He zips the backpack, heavy with books.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde hair at desk packing black Jansport backpack, shoving notebooks and textbooks inside, open laptop showing homework on desk, scattered papers and pencils, calculator visible, morning light, preparing for school, teen bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, neat organized desk, adult, child, dark hair

scenes.title: Looking in Mirror
scenes.description: Tyler stands at the sink looking in the mirror. His sandy blonde hair is messy, face showing typical teen skin—some acne on forehead and chin. Blue eyes look tired. He examines his face, touching a blemish. The mirror reflects toiletries: toothpaste, face wash, deodorant.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with messy sandy blonde hair standing at bathroom sink, looking in mirror, tired blue eyes, examining face, touching blemish, slight acne visible, toiletries on counter (toothpaste, face wash), bright bathroom lighting, morning grooming
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, perfect clear skin, adult, child, dark hair, long hair

scenes.title: Applying Face Wash
scenes.description: Close-up of Tyler squeezing face wash into his palm from the blue bottle. He applies it to his face, creating a slight lather. His hands work the product over his forehead and cheeks. Teen skincare routine for acne.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, close-up of teenage boy's hands squeezing blue Neutrogena face wash bottle, applying foam to face, slight lather on forehead and cheeks, teen skincare routine, bright bathroom lighting, close-up grooming scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult hands, child, dirty bathroom

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Tyler brushes his teeth in front of the mirror, toothbrush moving back and forth. White foam forms around his mouth. His free hand rests on the counter. He watches his own reflection, slightly bored with the routine.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde hair brushing teeth at bathroom mirror, blue toothbrush moving, white foam around mouth, bored expression, free hand on counter, bright bathroom lighting, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, dark hair, enthusiastic expression

scenes.title: Fixing Hair
scenes.description: Tyler runs his fingers through his sandy blonde hair, attempting to style it. No product, just hand-tousling to make it look intentionally messy rather than sleep-messy. He tilts his head, checking different angles in the mirror. Typical teen hair moment.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy running fingers through sandy blonde hair in bathroom mirror, styling without product, tilting head checking different angles, attempting intentionally messy look, typical teen moment, bright bathroom lighting
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, using hair product, adult, child, dark hair, long hair, neat styled hair

scenes.title: Dressed and Ready
scenes.description: Tyler looks at himself in the mirror, fully dressed: maroon zip-up hoodie over white t-shirt, medium blue jeans. He adjusts the hoodie collar, checks his hair one more time. Looks like a typical American high schooler. He grabs his sleep clothes to take back to his room.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde hair looking at himself in bathroom mirror, fully dressed in maroon zip-up hoodie over white t-shirt and blue jeans, adjusting hoodie collar, holding sleep clothes, typical American high school student appearance, bright bathroom lighting, ready for school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, messy appearance, adult, child, dark hair

scenes.title: Greeting Parents
scenes.description: Tyler enters the family kitchen. His mom stands at the stove cooking eggs, wearing nurse scrubs. Dad sits at a round kitchen table reading news on a tablet, coffee mug in hand. The kitchen has white cabinets, laminate counters, window over the sink showing the backyard. A coffee maker brews.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde hair entering family kitchen saying morning, mom in nurse scrubs cooking eggs at stove, dad sitting at round table reading tablet with coffee mug, white cabinets, laminate counters, window over sink, coffee maker, bright morning kitchen, family scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, luxury kitchen, empty kitchen, single person, dark hair

scenes.title: Mom Serving Breakfast
scenes.description: Mom places a plate in front of Tyler: scrambled eggs, two pieces of toast, a few strips of bacon. Steam rises from the eggs. She smiles at him. 'Eat up, bus comes at 7:45.' A similar plate goes in front of Dad. A glass of orange juice already sits at Tyler's place.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, mom's hands placing breakfast plate in front of 16-year-old white teenage boy at kitchen table, scrambled eggs, toast, bacon strips on plate, steam rising, glass of orange juice, dad with similar plate nearby, warm family breakfast scene, bright kitchen lighting
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, restaurant, empty table, cold food, single person

scenes.title: Eating Breakfast
scenes.description: Tyler eats breakfast, fork scooping scrambled eggs. He takes a bite of toast. Orange juice glass is half empty. Dad reads his tablet while eating. Mom sits down with her plate, checking her phone—shift schedule at the hospital.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde hair eating breakfast at kitchen table, fork scooping scrambled eggs, bite of toast, half-empty orange juice glass, dad reading tablet while eating, mom checking phone, family breakfast scene, bright kitchen lighting
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, empty kitchen, single person eating, formal dining, dark hair

scenes.title: Family Breakfast Scene
scenes.description: The family around the kitchen table: Tyler eating eggs, Emma (12-year-old sister) now seated with a bowl of cereal, Mom eating quickly between checking her phone, Dad finishing his coffee and tablet reading. Morning family chaos, everyone on their own schedule.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, family breakfast scene at round kitchen table, 16-year-old sandy blonde teenage boy eating eggs, 12-year-old light brown haired sister with cereal bowl, mom in scrubs checking phone while eating, dad with tablet and coffee, morning chaos, everyone on different schedules, bright kitchen, warm family scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, formal dining, restaurant, single person, empty kitchen

scenes.title: Taking Dishes to Sink
scenes.description: Tyler carries his plate and glass to the kitchen sink, rinsing them under the faucet. Through the window above the sink, the backyard is visible: small lawn, a swing set from when they were younger, a fence. He leaves the dishes in the sink for later.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 16-year-old white teenage boy with sandy blonde hair rinsing plate and glass at kitchen sink, water running from faucet, window above sink showing backyard with swing set and fence, leaving dishes in sink, morning routine, bright kitchen lighting
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, dishwasher, dirty sink, adult, child, dark hair
